member.summary: Adds a image processor to a group.
member.param: the handle/id of the image processor.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.CloseImageProcessor(System.Int32)
member.param: the handle/id of the image processor.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.CreateGroup
member.summary: Creates a group for controlling more than one image-processor simultanously.
member.returns: the handle/id of the group for later use.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.CreateImageProcessorForCamera(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an image processor (for processing the image stream of a camera) and connects it with a camera. The camera is available to this image processor only.
member.param: Name of the camera as configured in the server.
Selector for a camera-state-config, as configured in the server.
member.returns: the handle/id of the image-processor for later use.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.CreateSymmetricLoadProcessorForCamera(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called when [create symmetric load processor for camera].
member.returns: the handle/id of the image-processor for later use.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.StartImageProcessing(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the image processing. Images will be acquired and processed.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.StopImageProcessing(System.Int32)
member.summary: Query a stop. No more images will be acquired. The corresponding camera gets free. The image processing finishes, as soon as the computation of the results has finished. After that, a notification will be sent through the callback interface.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.IsCameraFree(System.String)
member.summary: Tells if a specific camera is free
member.param: Name of the camera as configured in the server.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.StartWebcamModeForCameras(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the webcam mode for cameras.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.GetResult(System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtains the result for a specific result-id.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServer.SignOut(System.String)
member.summary: Represents an event that is raised when the sign-out operation is complete.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The address of the service endpoint.

member.name: M:IntactVisionServer.ConService.IntactVisionServerCallbackProxy.NotifyCameraFree(System.String)
